abstract: The marketing for the stock listing of Agricultural Bank of China kicked off on Thursday, setting the stage for what could be the biggest initial public offering the world has seen.
snippet: The marketing for the stock listing of Agricultural Bank of China kicked off on Thursday, setting the stage for what could be the biggest initial public offering the world has seen.
lead_paragraph: The marketing for the stock listing of Agricultural Bank of China kicked off on Thursday, setting the stage for what could be the biggest initial public offering the world has seen, Bettina Wassener reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Giant Chinese Bank Sets Stage for Record Offering
